processor
Class ReviewProcessor

java.lang.Object
  processor.ReviewProcessor

public class ReviewProcessor
extends java.lang.Object

The review processor class reads in all training data and outputs the User, Business, and Review objects to files

uvMap

private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> uvMap
The key is the useful vote count, and the value is the number of reviews with that count.

bidToRid

private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> bidToRid
Map of business ids to Review IDs. Each key is a business id and the value is the list of review ids associated with that business id.

topThird

private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> topThird
Holds the top third rated reviews. So, the reviews with the highest "useful" rating.

bottomThird

private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> bottomThird
Holds the bottom third rated reviews. So, the reviews with the lowest "useful" ratings.

DESC

private static boolean DESC
The value to determine what order a hashmap will be sorted in.

ridToReview

public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Review> ridToReview
Holds a map of review ids to Reviews. The key is the review id and the value is the Review object.

getTopAndBottomReviews

public static void getTopAndBottomReviews()
Sorts the reviews into the top and bottom third. This is done to get better results when extracting the noun phrases and classifying later on.
